overview: The wedding was simple but nice for Carol and Jim. It all started on their honeymoon night. Rushing to consumate their marriage, they find themselves at a chiche “sensual awareness” retreat, headed by sex guru Mahesh O Rielly. Shelter for the night is not all they find. They are virtually prisoners of a group of extra-ordinary people trying to achieve a higher level of sexual awareness.
title: Honeymooners
